settings.text:
"The 75LJ meets our corporate safety standards, a paramount requirement."
Team Leader
Covanta Kent, Inc.
Grand Rapids, MI

"Trust me, our Guardair guns see a fair share of abuse. They are tough and very well built."
Machine Operator
Felters of South Carolina
Roebuck, SC

"We have tried other safety air guns but found Guardair to be the most reliable and last the longest. Simple construction, tough, and durable. They meet our needs."
Owner
Andritz, Inc.
Muncy, PA

"The fact that Guardair air guns meet OSHA requirements is the key in our production facility."
Mechanic
B&G Foods
Roseland, NJ

"One of the best safety air guns I have ever used. The Long John is powerful and safe. Thank you for making my job easier!"
Electrician
Quad/Graphics
Jonesboro, AR

"Extremely comfortable and well-made."
Maintenance Technician
Ocean Spray
Aberdeen, WA

"Our staff likes the feel of the Ultras, their performance and durability."
Mechanic
Ralcorp Frozen Bakery Products
Wyoming, MI

"Works better than any other OSHA compliant air guns. The extra air volume and pressure really shortens clean up time. Great product."
Manager
Longview Fibre Paper & Packaging
Yakima, WA

"I really like the Ultra. It's tough, comfortable, and really puts out a lot of air. That helps to get the job done in a short amount of time."
Sheet Metal Mechanic
LGB Repair Shops
Peoria, AZ

"Awesome Product! We had ergo problems with other air guns. This gun is great! I highly recommend it!"
Health & Safety Manager
Cross Manufacturing
Lewis, KS

"WOW! I can't say enough about the Lazer 600. The ergonomics are superior…..Thanks Guardair."
Press Shift Leader
Vertis Communications
Portland, OR

"Very well built and sturdy. The Lazer 650 handles lots of abuse in our corrosive environment."
Machinist
Mosaic Potash
Colonsay, SK

"Love the ergonomic design of the Lazer 600. It’s so comfortable."
Machinist
Federal-Mogul Powertrain Systems
South Bend, IN

"Used the 900 in our shop for years and they have always performed well."
Mechanic
Baughman Enterprises
Suffolk, VA

"900LJ is a great product. One of the best on the market."
Maintence Manager
Hubbell Power Systems
Leeds, AL

"Long lasting and affordable."
Chemical Engineer
John Deere Waterloo Works
Waterloo, IA

"Best compact air gun we’ve found!"
Maintenance
Diamond Manufacturing
Michigan City, IN

"OSHA compliance and incredible power...we love 'em."
Safety Manager
Wyman & Simpson
Richmond, ME

"The Force 5 works way beyond my expectations. GREAT PRODUCT, KUDOS!"
Manager
Apply-A-Line Inc.
Pacific, WA

"Again Guardair has developed a great, user-friendly, safe product."
Engineer
Mount Vernon Mills
Williamston, SC

"Well-made tools that stand up to everything we put them through."
Owner
Ringer Metal Supply
Kimbolton, OR

"We were formerly using a pipe with a ball valve before discovering the Inforcer. The pipe was heavy, unsafe with no "deadman" lever. The Inforcer is FAR superior! Thank you!"
Fleet Manager
International Paper
Plant City, FL

"This is a very helpful tool for cleaning hard-to-reach places and having enough volume to get the job done!"
Safety Supervisor
Roseburg Forest Products
Dillard, OR

"Nice light unit. The venturi nozzle effectively directs more air to where we need it."
Highway Maintenance Supervisor
Sacramento County Transportation Authority
Sacramento, CA

"Picture did not do this product justice. It looked heavy duty but was surprised to see just how heavy duty."
Operations Superintendent
Bridger Coal Company
Point of Rocks, WY

"Great for cleaning near machines. Light-weight and easy to use."
Proprietor
Moonlight Machining
Berlin, NH

"The Guardair GunVac allows us to get into spaces that shop vacs will not. Response on the production floor has been outstanding and we keep buying more. Great product!"
Manufacturing Engineer
Powell Industries
Houston, TX

"Very useful product. Simple and durable. We have 3 in service at all times. Keep up the good work, Guardair."
Maintenance Supervisor
Castalloy Corp.
Waukesha, WI

"We are really pleased with the 1500 GunVac. It exceeds our expectations."
Tech Supervisor
BorgWarner Automotive
Muncie, IN

"Our Guardair vacuum outperforms other vacs we've owned in the past."
Machine Operator
Stryker Instruments
Portage, MI

"You guys offer a great product with an awesome warranty."
Warehouse Associate
Elk Hills Power Plant
Tupman, CA

"Normal wet/dry electric vacs are no match for the Guardair vacuum."
Maintenance Manager
Gulf Coast Laundry Services
Gulfport, MS

"I plan to recommend Guardair vacs to our other 68 branches around the nation."
Service Technician
Siemens Water Technologies
Nashville, TN

"Our Guardair vacuum takes a lot of abuse yet is very dependable."
Senior Mechanic
GKN Sinter Metals
Emporium, PA

"Over the years I've purchased a number of Guardair vacs and been very happy with their performance."
Western District Project Manager
Safety-Kleen
Vacaville, CA

"Anyone needing the ultimate in vacuuming power needs to order one."
Lead Line Support
Gates Rubber
Versailles, MO

"I won't buy any other brand!"
Maintenance Manager
Freeport-McMoran
Green Valley, AZ

"We love our Model N551BC!"
Mechanic
Anderson Copper & Brass
Oak Forest, IL

"Owned one for years and still providing good service."
Operator
Spectra Energy
Owingsville, KY

"Durable, powerful, but best of all it works well!"
Maintenance Technician
Alstom Power Air Preheater
Wellsville, NY

"This vacuum is awesome….provides fantastic performance for what we need it to do."
Maintenance Supervisor
Barry Controls
Vestaburg, MI

"Excellent product quality and service from Guardair."
Vice President
Intricate Metal Forming
Roanoke, VA

"Simply a durable product that performs well."
Engineering/Maintenance Manager
Uptown Bakeries Bridgeport, NJ

"Reliable, sturdy, heavy-duty. We are very impressed with this vacuum."
Shipping Coordinator/Purchasing Agent
Dow-Key Microwave
Tucson, AZ

"Great product with amazing quality and durability."
Operations Specialist
Pfiizer
Portage, MI

"Thank you, Guardair, for manufacturing such a high quality product in the USA."
Inventory Control Manager
Alcore
Edgewood, MD
